Mark Adelson

Editor – Journal of Structured Finance Former Chief Credit Officer – Standard & Poors

Mark Adelson is an independent consultant, the editor of The Journal of Structured Finance, and the content director at Portfolio Management Research. He was chief strategy officer of The BondFactor Company LLC from November 2012 to April 2016.

Mark Adelson served as S & P’s chief credit officer from May 2008 until December 2011 and then held a research position at the company through August 2012. As S & P’s chief credit officer he supervised the overhaul of the company’s rating criteria in the wake of the financial crisis.

He has broad expertise in securitization, with particular emphasis on mortgage-backed securities (MBS) and collateralized debt obligations (CDOs). He has authored numerous articles and reports covering a wide range of fixed-income subjects including credit analysis, models and model risk, regulatory and accounting topics, and detailed coverage of the major securitization industry conferences over the past 10 years. Adelson is also a lawyer, admitted to practice in New York.
